title: Squatter

fields.name: I'll Bunk With You:
fields.value: Target a player. Visits against you will fail, but visits against your target will also target you.

fields.name: Wanna Chat? (Passive):
fields.value: You may make as many Hello Neighbor channels as you wish during the Evening. However, if a player correctly identifies you as a Squatter in their private channel and says to remove you, you will be removed from the Hello Neighbor and will not be able to form a Hello Neighbor with that player again. If a player incorrectly calls out a non-Squatter, they receive a permanent 10% penalty to all of their Evening scores.

fields.name: Borrowing (x1, Charge 70%):
fields.value: Attempt to use an ability during its respective phase. If any player who you have had a Hello Neighbor with that has not called you out has that ability, you will successfully use it.

fields.name: Let's Swap (x0, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Target a player that you have had a Hello Neighbor with and who hasn't called you out. You will take over their role and convert them to a Squatter.

fields.name: Desperation (Locked, x1):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked if every living player has called you out. Attack a player. If you kill them, **Let's Swap** will activate, but they will not be converted to a Squatter.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully use **Let's Swap** or **Desperation** and fulfill your new role's win condition.
